segments.text: Hi , Mike . I am going to move on the first of next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations ! So , have you started planning your move ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am trying to find good movers now . Do you know any ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you do for your last move ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since I did not have much staff , I asked my cousin to help me out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . that's very nice of him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it was . But I still have some information that I collected last time , and if you want , I will give it to you .
segments.speaker: S2
